name: Devil's Flock
description:
Game Info:

Your chickens have joined a satanic cult. They must be stopped!

Wave Survival Top-down shooter with random enemies and random player upgrades. Chaotic in nature.

Game Jam Info:

LevelUp Game Jam 2022 Project: https://www.game-levelup.com/eventos/game-jam-2022

Theme: Element of chance
